author: Adrian Purcell Heathcote
content:
Looks like my body is forcing me to give up coffee! I keep forgetting to have a second cup, which leads me to sleep better that night, which leads me to not need a second cup of coffee the next day!
It looks as though the only reason people NEED coffee is to compensate for their terrible diet --- which saps them of energy and forces them to compensate in some way. But a proper diet puts everything in a proper alignment. Over time, of course.
